content: free pattern - f38 augusta shawl by andrea mules all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 5/20/13 © fairmount fibers ltd 2013 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 1 of 3 free pattern - f38 size gauge 56 wingspan 27 depth 8 double_crochet clusters = 4 materials abbreviations manos del uruguay serena 60% baby alpaca 40% pima cotton chain chain approx 50g/170 yd 1 skip ea colors a b c d and e shown in s2590 double_crochet double_crochet natural s2044 lemonade s2040 gold s6034 valencia and s2110 space space zinnia us d/3 25mm hook or size to obtain gauge all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 5/20/13 © fairmount fibers ltd 2013 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 2 of 3 free pattern - f38 instructions attach color b ch3 turn work continue in pattern until all of color see chart below b is used ending just before the chain-3 at end of row with color a chain 8 attach color c continue in pattern until all of color c is used end- set-up row 1 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook ch1 skip 1 foundation chain 2 ing just before the chain-3 at end of row double_crochet into next chain chain 2 2 double_crochet into same chain ch1 2 double_crochet into last foun- attach color d continue in pattern until all of color d is used end- dation chain ch3 turn work ing just before the chain-3 at end of row row 1 1 double_crochet into space between the 2 double_crochet s below *ch1 2 double_crochet in chain attach color e continue in pattern until all of color e is used end- space repeat from * to 2-chain space in center of previous row ch1 2 double_crochet ing just before the chain-3 at end of row ch2 2 double_crochet into next 2-chain space *ch1 2 double_crochet in chain space repeat from * fasten_off to last chain space ch1 2 double_crochet in space between double_crochet and 3-chain below ch3 turn work finishing repeat row 1 until all of color a is used ending just before the chain-3 weave in ends hand wash in cold water and gentle detergent lay at end of row flat to dry pattern repeat chain double_crochet row 1 set-up all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 5/20/13 © fairmount fibers ltd 2013 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 3 of 3
